verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Para chieng ki duogo Yesu
para kibiro epiny
para mondo adonjie piny
polomalo.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ka Yesu ne o gurgi
jo kuo ariyo
jakuo moro ne yanye
to moro ne ywage.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
To jal machielo cha,
ne ok odewe e
ne pok olokore,
ne otho gi richone.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jaduong' Nicodemus,
gi Joseph Arimathea
ne gi kawo Ringre Ruoth,
ma gi keto ebur maber.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Adwaro in iwuon,
mondo ilokri
to in kilokori,
in ibed gi Yesu Ruoth.
